title: Champion Skin Concept - Abominable Gnar
body:
**Champion Skin Concept - Abominable Gnar**
The general idea was to create a new Snow-down skin for Gnar, Abominable Gnar.
Basically in Gnars mini form he would be some sort of little snow animal (probably white) and his 'q' (Boomerang Throw) might resemble a snow star (like the one Orianna's snow-down skin displays when you use her 'w' (Command: Dissonance)). In Gnars mega form he would be some sort of large white yeti/abominable snowman type creature and his 'q' (Boulder Toss" might become a large snowball.
This is just a general idea, open for adaption, would greatly appreciate a response.
Thankyou.
- NiftyNinja (OCE)

**EDIT 1**: Would really appreciate it if after reading through this you either up/down-**vote**d the post in regards to your thoughts on the idea, thanks.

**EDIT 2**: Just found somebody posting a very similar idea on Reddit about 2 months ago which wasn't exactly what I had in mind but managed to recieve over 2400 up votes. http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2hpjzm/art_abominable_snowgnar_skin_concept/
He/She has included an image of their idea which has been now been attached to this thread.

**NOTE**: Credit for image goes to Reddit user **IfishIII** and/or "Carlo Spacone", as far as I know they/he/she made it.

**EDIT 3**: Ty Rito (Gentleman Gnar is strikingly similar).
